title: Distributed Collaboration Protocol
description: Cardano will bring contributors at a rapidly growing rate. A rigid approach to collaboration will be unsustainable and inefficient at scale.
solution: A protocol/tool for collaboration without needing to see the bigger picture. Research on optimizing simple interactions for complex results.
experience: I've spent 15+ years studying complex systems with a focus on how primitives in language design can simplify the process of building them.
